input.name: q
input.onblur: if(this.value=='')this.value='To search type and hit enter';
input.onfocus: if(this.value=='To search type and hit enter')this.value='';
input.value: To search type and hit enter

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

b:includable.div: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean blandit lacus in leo gravida fringilla. Donec ullamcorper sapien a massa sollicitudin, ut dignissim nisl bibendum. Morbi tempus orci id neque iaculis congue.

div.style: text-align: right; padding: 0; float: right; margin: 0px;

div.p: Copyright document.write(new Date().getFullYear()) | All Rights Reserved.
